name: Call me. Maybe?
description:
Welcome to your new job. The best job.

You will be working at the telephone switchboard and you're going to enjoy it!

Every 10 seconds there's a new call and it will be your job to manage all of them.

You can make mistakes. 3 mistakes to be exact. Any more and you're done!

The game is controlled only by mouse. Just..

...do your job properly.
